text: okay random question. Has anyone else's HubDB display container gotten.... narrower? Mine doesn't seem to fill the page any longer and is contrained on load to 1377px wide. It makes my wide monitor very sad :disappointed:
Yeah, <@UDFTHC6PK>, my HubDB tables are now contained and sad as well.
*sigh* guess I'll just be canceling out that style when I load the page
this actually gives me hope that they are actively working on it. At one point they said they were working on better ways to filter, provide views, etc to make editing data more user friendly
agreed. i'd love to see some drag and drop row sorting.
That would be amazing to see happen
